text: Pensacola Christian College (PCC) is an accredited, fundamentalist, Independent Baptist college in Pensacola, Florida. It was started in 1974 by Arlin Horton. It is accredited by the Transnational Association of Christian Colleges and Schools since 2013. == References == == Other websites == *Pensacola Christian College official site *Christianity Today: College Pays Millions in Taxes Category:Christian colleges and universities in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Florida Category:1974 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Florida
title: Pensacola Christian College
